title: Anand PANYARACHUN - Biography - The Honorary Graduates - HKU Honorary Graduates

quotes: Mr Anand Panyarachun is a much respected former civil servant who became a businessman and statesman and who was twice asked to be the interim Prime Minister of Thailand after two national crises earlier this decade.

organizations.name: Thailand Development Research Institute
quotes: He also sits on the boards of many international companies and chairs the Thailand Development Research Institute and the Thailand Environment Institute.

roles.title: roving ambassador

Mr Anand Panyarachun is a much respected former civil servant who became a businessman and statesman and who was twice asked to be the interim Prime Minister of Thailand after two national crises earlier this decade.
